name: Benny's Memory Game
description:
Benny's Memory Game is a simple memory game build mostly in unreal engine 4s widget blueprint system.

The aim of the game is to get as high a score as possible
There are 3 modes Easy(2x2 Grid) Normal(4x4 Grid) and Hard(5x5 Grid)
Upon choosing a mode each block in the grid will be assigned a random colour. The game will then allow you ten seconds to try to memorise what this grid looks like. Once the ten seconds are up, all of the blocks will turn grey apart from one which will turn white. Your job is to remember which colour the white block was before 10 seconds ran out
WARNING: Some PC's detect this as harmful as it is a .exe installer file.
